name.baseName: Sanitary materials and medical supplies ; Chemical Pharmaceutical Ingredients ; Solid Preparation ; 200less than or equal toyieldless than 1000 t/a; NESPS2
卫生材料及医药用品 ; 化学药品原料药 ; 固体制剂 ; 200小于等于产量小于1000吨/年 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual normal operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual normal operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 此数据集涉及年产量在200吨至1000吨之间的卫生材料、医疗用品和化学药品原料药固体制剂的生产。这一过程对从事制药工业特别是生产片剂和胶囊等固体制剂的实体具有重要意义。数据描述了用于管理生产过程中释放出的化学需氧量（COD）、氨氮、总磷、有机结合氮和挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）等污染物的末端处理技术。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码27,三级代码277.0文件，在完整版文件中第3237页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic/aerobic biological combined treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.6，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual normal operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物理化学处理法+厌/好氧生物组合处理+物理化学处理法，其效率为98.6，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（天）/正常生产时间（天）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic/aerobic biological combined treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management94，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual normal operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物理化学处理法+厌/好氧生物组合处理+物理化学处理法，其效率为94，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（天）/正常生产时间（天）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮

污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物理化学处理法+厌氧生物处理+好氧生物处理，其效率为91.5，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（天）/正常生产时间（天）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷
